ModMetaData.name: Badge Master
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX/Various
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla-like Pawn Badges created by Various artists for the Pawn Badge mod. Includes far too many authors and badge types to list. Go on STEAM and search for "badge," you'll find the source material. All credit goes to the original authors, I just yanked the textures and defs.
